application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Sycamore (T1): Cut ivy. Remove low hanging secondary branches on the mainbranch over the road to give at least 5.5m clearance and minorlower branches to give the same over the car park.Lime (T2): Remove small low hanging branches to give at least 5.5m clearance.Sycamore (T3): Fell to ground level Sycamore (T4): Fell to ground level Sycamore (T6): Cut back branch ends to clear the roof of 23a by 2m.All proposed work to fulfil recommendations in attached report. To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure thata satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained. All specified work is within good arboricultural practice and husbandry.Replacement trees 12-14cm girth Pyrus calleryana ???Chanticleer, Liquidambar styraciflua, Carpinus betulus Fastigiata
